info.description: A multi-cloud Blueprint API for Cloud Automation Services
info.title: VMware Cloud Assembly Blueprint API

get.description:
The page contains information about the supported API versions and the latest API version. The version parameter is optional but highly recommended.
If you do not specify explicitly an exact version, you will be calling the latest supported API version.
Here is an example of a call which specifies the exact version you are using: GET /blueprint/api/blueprints?apiVersion=2019-09-12

post.summary: Creates a blueprint from a Terraform blueprint configuration (obtained from /create-blueprint-mapping).

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about

post.summary: Retrieves and parses the specified Terraform configuration file(s) and returns relevant information for blueprint construction.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about

get.summary: Returns a paginated list of commits for a specified configuration source.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about

get.summary: Shows directories of the configuration source repository that correspond to Terraform configurations.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about

parameters.name: commitId
parameters.description: The commit ID corresponding to the version of the configuration source.

parameters.name: configurationSourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration source to inspect.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: A file path prefix. The prefix is interpreted in the context of the configuration source's path prefix. Results will only include directories under this path.

get.summary: Returns a paginated list of configuration sources configured as storage for Terraform configurations.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about

parameters.name: projects
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of project IDs. Results will be filtered so only configuration sources accessible from one or more of these projects will be returned.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search parameter to search based on configuration source name or repository.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property (asc|desc). Default sort order is descending on updatedAt. Sorting is supported on fields createdAt, updatedAt, createdBy, updatedBy, version.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of records you want to skip

parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about

requestScopeOrg.description: Flag to indicate blueprint can be requested from any project in org

dependsOnResources.description: Resource depends on other resources in the plan

ignoreDeleteFailures.description: Ignore delete failures in blueprint request

plan.description: Plan only without affecting existing deployment

repositoryId.description: The ID of a content source

FileTree.title: FileTree
FileTree.description: A list of directories found in a remote repository.

description.description: The description of the output value in the Terraform configuration.

name.description: The name of the output value in the Terraform configuration.

sensitive.description: A flag indicating that the field should be obscured because of security concerns.

$dynamicDefault.description: Path that can be used to retrieve single permissible default value

$dynamicEnum.description: Path that can be used to retrieve permissible values

encrypted.description: Flag indicating if property is encrypted

enum.description: Restrict a value to a fixed set of values for the property

format.description: The expected (and pre-defined) format to be used for string validations. Supported format values include: date-time, email, ip-address, alphanumeric, phone, etc.

items.description: Property items defines a schema for the contents of an array

maxItems.description: Maximum number of items for the property

maxLength.description: String instance is validated against this keyword for its maximum length

minItems.description: Minimum number of items for the property

minLength.description: String instance is validated against this keyword for its minimum length

oneOf.description: Ensures the given data is valid against only one of the specified schemas

pattern.description: Regular expression to express constraint for the property

readOnly.description: Flag indicating if property is read only

type.description: Property type should be among valid types (number, integer, string, array, boolean, object)

attributes.description: The Terraform provider's statically configured attributes.

commitId.description: ID that identifies the commit that corresponds to the desired version of the remote file(s).

repositoryId.description: The ID of the relevant configuration source repository.

sourceDirectory.description: A path to the desired Terraform directory.

TerraformConfigurationSourceReference.title: TerraformConfigurationSourceReference
TerraformConfigurationSourceReference.description: Reference information about a Terraform Configuration source that stores Terraform configuration files.

compatibleVersions.description: Compatible versions of Terraform that can be used to execute this configuration.

configurationSourceReference.description: A reference to the location where the Terraform configuration is being hosted.

outputValues.description: Information about output values generated by the Terraform configuration.

providers.description: Information about providers used in the Terraform configuration.

variables.description: Information about variables expected by the Terraform configuration.

warnings.description: A list of warnings related to the Terraform configuration.

TerraformToBlueprintMapping.title: TerraformToBlueprintMapping
TerraformToBlueprintMapping.description: Information about a Terraform configuration needed to create a blueprint.

authenticationType.description: The type of authentication for the download url

sha256Checksum.description: The sha256 checksum of the terraform binary

username.description: The user name for basic authentication

version.description: The numeric version of terraform release

defaultValue.description: The variable's default value in the Terraform configuration.

description.description: The variable's description in the Terraform configuration.

name.description: The variable's name in the Terraform configuration.

sensitive.description: Whether the variable should be obscured because of security concerns.

type.description: The variable's type in the Terraform configuration. Complex Terraform types may be treated as Strings.
